author: Sarah Ahmad
text: A customer called and complained about the quality of our products and requested a refund

updates.author: Jawad Al-Amir
updates.text: I called the customer back and arranged for a refund

updates.author: Salem Aziz
updates.text: A refund wouldn't apply in this situation, you should've called your supervisor

author: Nawras Sayyed
text: There are three complaints from the same customer regarding shipping time

author: Ahmed Ali
text: A customer requested an exchange for a different size

updates.author: Mariam Al-Khalil
updates.text: I checked and the requested size is out of stock. I offered a refund instead but the customer declined

author: Khaled Hussein
text: A customer reported a missing item from their order

updates.author: Ali Saad
updates.text: I checked and found that the item was indeed missing. I arranged for it to be shipped to the customer separately

updates.author: Faisal Hasan
updates.text: The missing item was found in the warehouse and I informed the customer about it. They requested to keep it anyway

author: Hala Rizk
text: A customer complained about the delivery person being rude

updates.author: Yara Ahmed
updates.text: I apologized to the customer and promised to address the issue with the delivery company

author: Omar Salim
text: A customer received a damaged product

updates.author: Aya Khalifa
updates.text: I arranged for a replacement to be sent to the customer

updates.author: Samar Hamed
updates.text: The replacement arrived and the customer confirmed that it was in good condition

author: Tarek Nasser
text: A customer complained about a delay in their order

updates.author: Rami Ali
updates.text: I contacted the warehouse and ordered to take special care for this order in the fastest way possible
